data.name: 8-Bit Armies Demo
data.detailed_description:
a Blast From the Past

8-Bit Armies is a retro Real-Time Strategy game for the PC. With a colorful, blocky voxel art style, 8-Bit Armies is Petroglyph's most fast-paced, friendly, and accessible RTS game to date. Collect resources, build up and defend your base, amass your army of military units, and ultimately crush your opponents! 8-Bit Armies, 8-Bit Hordes, and 8-Bit Invaders features offline single-player mission campaigns, two-player cooperative campaigns, AI skirmish modes, and Player-vs-Player Multiplayer modes running on dedicated game servers. If you're interested in hours and hours of offline/campaign gameplay, definitely check out our the full version of our games

This Demo is a Free-to-Play Multiplayer version of Petroglyph's popular 8-Bit Series of games. Get online and play one of six different armies across dozens of multiplayer maps versus players around the world. You get a different faction to play each day from 8-Bit Armies, Hordes, and Invaders including a sample of maps you can launch games with.

This free demo includes all of the following...

  • All 6 Armies (Renegades, Guardians, Lightbringers, Deathsworn, Colonial Marines, and Cranioids).
  • Free players can join any game in progress including those hosted by owners of the full game.
  • The original game tutorial to get you up and running quickly
  • In-Game Manual to reference on demand
  • Select music tracks from our composer Frank Klepacki across all three original titles
  • Replay mode to watch and learn new strategies from the top players
  • Observer mode to spectate games in progress and stream online
  • Custom Game options to choose your own win conditions, random crates, cash, and other parameters
  • AI support so you and a friend can team up with or against the computer
  • Quickmatch mode - just click and get into the action
  • Dedicated 24/7 monitored servers"

The full package including all our games includes the above plus...
  • Access to all 6 factions with no restrictions
  • Over 70 challenging offline campaign missions
  • 30+ Co-op missions to play with your friends
  • 30+ multiplayer/skirmish maps that support up to 8 players online
  • The full in-game soundtracks for all 3 8-Bit titles
  • AIs with multiple difficulty options to play with cooperatively or fight against in skirmish and multiplayer modes
  • Classic Base-Building mechanics let you construct the ultimate HQ from which to launch attacks against your foes
  • Destructible environments on maps ranging from small to very large
  • Easy to understand modern military units and structures lets RTS beginners jump right in
  • From the same team that brought you RTS classics such as Star Wars: Empire at War, Universe at War, and Grey Goo

Buy one of the games - or all three at a substantial discount. 8-Bit Armies, Invaders, and Hordes are for anyone that enjoys fast action, strategy games. With hours of solo and co-op gameplay included, there's something here for everyone!

data.short_description: The 8-Bit Series of games are a fun dive into the Real-Time Strategy genre. With a colorful, blocky voxel art style, this is Petroglyph's most fast-paced, friendly, and accessible RTS game to date.  This free multiplayer demo allows players to jump in and compete online with a different faction each day as frequently as you wish.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Dutch, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz+ Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 6800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
